snippet: More than 500,000 children in eastern Ukraine have been “deeply affected” by the trauma of living through the violence between government forces and insurgents that began two years ago, Unicef said.
abstract: United Nations Children's Fund reports that more than 500,000 children in eastern Ukraine have been affected by trauma from violent conflict between insurgents and government forces that began in 2014.
lead_paragraph: More than 500,000 children in eastern Ukraine have been “deeply affected” by the trauma of living through the violence between government forces and insurgents that began two years ago, Unicef said.

headline.main: Ukraine: Unicef Warns of Conflict’s Toll on Children
headline.print_headline: Europe; Ukraine: Unicef Warns of Conflict’s Toll
